name: CTCallCenter
desc: An object that provides a list of current cellular calls, and provides the ability to respond to state changes for calls.DeprecatedGetting call information in Core Telephony is no longer supported. Use CallKit instead.

items.name: var callEventHandler: ((CTCall) -> Void)?
items.desc: A closure dispatched when a call changes state.

items.name: var currentCalls: Set<CTCall>?
items.desc: An array representing the cellular calls in progress.
